div.div: Scientifically speaking, there's no such thing as a Brontosaurus.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U7eiJL&via=Digg&text=The Brontosaurus Never Existed

div.a: John McAfee Records Very Bizarre Live Q&A From Guatemalan Jail

div.div: John McAfee has recorded a live Q&A on Ustream from what appears to be a jail in Guatemala.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RSzwQ7&via=Digg&text=John McAfee Records Very Bizarre Live Q&A From Guatemalan Jail

div.div: From the early days of Quora, when it was the Biggest Thing In The Valley, people have been saying “Quora will be bigger than Twitter.” But–sorry. No. Not even close. What happened?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VuRJP1&via=Digg&text=Q: What’s Wrong With Quora?

div.a: 'Most Famous Wolf In The World' Shot Dead

div.div: A wolf beloved by visitors and tracked by scientists at Yellowstone national park has been shot dead by hunters, reigniting debate over the targeting of the animal.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UoUrVh&via=Digg&text='Most Famous Wolf In The World' Shot Dead

div.a: The Five Worst Wall Street Trades Of 2012

div.div: Although the U.S. economy has managed a modest improvement in 2012, there were still some pretty terrible trades on Wall Street during the past year.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UphejC&via=Digg&text=The Five Worst Wall Street Trades Of 2012

div.div: You can do more than you think to stop climate change.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VXrW4o&via=Digg&text=Climate Change Can Be Stopped

div.a: Watch Syrian Rebels Control A Tank Turret With A Playstation Controller

div.div: Syrian rebels have jury rigged a tank turret to be controlled by a Playstation controller.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XGHo92&via=Digg&text=Watch Syrian Rebels Control A Tank Turret With A Playstation Controller

div.div: Without basic safety features, a road in Bangladesh has become a killer.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SW7JuR&via=Digg&text=The World's Deadliest Road

div.a: Is This The Worst Free Throw Ever?

div.div: "Worst ever" is a strong phrase, but when the ball doesn't just miss the entire basket but also barely makes it past the free throw line, the designation is deserved.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XG8gGe&via=Digg&text=Is This The Worst Free Throw Ever?

div.div: How photoshop would work in real life.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QKu6oF&via=Digg&text=If Real Life Was Photoshop

div.div: On the Internet Archive, a hi-rez scan of the 1983 Radio Shack computer catalog, which is a wonderland of jaw-dropping prices for prosumer equipment from my boyhood that doesn't even qualify as a toddler's toy today.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UNYFuh&via=Digg&text=Radio Shack Computer Catalog From 1983

div.a: This Video Of A Horrendous Parking Job Is So Bad It Hurts

div.div: This video of someone trying to park their beautiful BMW is almost worse than the rage you feel at the jerk suffering from vertical video syndrome.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TPdbkx&via=Digg&text=This Video Of A Horrendous Parking Job Is So Bad It Hurts

div.a: How Apple Really Lost Its Lead In The '80s

div.div: Apple went from being the wealthy market leader to an also-ran in the blink of an eye. It's going to happen again, too, warn these people, if Apple doesn't learn anything.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UnKFTf&via=Digg&text=How Apple Really Lost Its Lead In The '80s

div.a: How Penguins Adorably Respond When One Falls Down

div.div: If you have 12 seconds to spare, this video is absolutely worth it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Re5lTh&via=Digg&text=How Penguins Adorably Respond When One Falls Down

div.a: G4 No More, Will Be Rebranded As Esquire Channel

div.div: In its bid for the largely untapped metrosexual viewership, NBCUniversal is set to rebrand G4 channel as the Esquire channel.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XAg5x4&via=Digg&text=G4 No More, Will Be Rebranded As Esquire Channel

div.a: Legendary Astronomer Sir Patrick Moore Dies

div.div: Sir Patrick presented the BBC program "The Sky At Night" for over 50 years, making him the longest-running host of the same television show ever.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YQxkMa&via=Digg&text=Legendary Astronomer Sir Patrick Moore Dies

div.div: Here are some famous-self portraits photoshopped to look like selfies.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TVjiBD&via=Digg&text=If Famous Portraits Were Selfies

div.a: Mitt Romney Tells Manny Pacquiao He Lost The Election

div.div: The former President candidate attended the fight between Juan Manuel Marquez and Manny Pacquiao in Las Vegas Saturday night. “Hello Manny. I ran for president. I lost.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YPM51P&via=Digg&text=Mitt Romney Tells Manny Pacquiao He Lost The Election

div.a: Thief Steals iPhone From Quadriplegic Man

div.div: A quadriplegic man with cerebral palsy is missing the phone that gave him a voice when a teenager stole it off his wheelchair, he says.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YLFYeE&via=Digg&text=Thief Steals iPhone From Quadriplegic Man

div.div: SO THAT'S WHY BUZZFEED MADE RUBBABLE GIFs
Boom in X-rated animated photos and GIFs may evidence shrinking attention spans, but they're unlikely to take over.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YZiNwt&via=Digg&text=GIF Porn Is Booming

div.a: The Brutal Punch That Knocked Out Manny Pacquiao

div.div: The fourth iteration of Pacquiao-Márquez did not disappoint, coming to the end at 2:59 of the sixth round when Juan Manuel Márquez connected flush with Pac-Man's face and dropped him to the mat, winning by TKO.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TOmYr8&via=Digg&text=The Brutal Punch That Knocked Out Manny Pacquiao

div.a: 'Star Wars' Was Based On A True Story

div.div: A galaxy far, far away looks awfully familiar. In 'Star Wars And History,' historical scholars compare Lucas's universe to our own.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VUlknb&via=Digg&text='Star Wars' Was Based On A True Story

div.div: WHATEVER, SUDOKU IS WHERE IT'S AT

div.a: How Crossword Puzzles Are Made And Why They're Broken

div.div: The financial stakes of the crossword are higher than a casual solver might realize.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RI4CK1&via=Digg&text=How Crossword Puzzles Are Made And Why They're Broken

div.a: Pirate Bay Founder Released From Solitary Confinement

div.div: After three months in solitary confinement Pirate Bay co-founder Gottfrid Svartholm will be released from custody.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YQey7s&via=Digg&text=Pirate Bay Founder Released From Solitary Confinement

div.a: Inside The Facility Where The NYPD Learns To Shoot

div.div: A behind-the-scenes look at how America's largest police force trains to shoot.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TUPB3L&via=Digg&text=Inside The Facility Where The NYPD Learns To Shoot

div.a: Everyday Objects Photographed To Look Like Sea Creatures

div.div: In an effort to draw attention to "The Great Pacific Garbage Patch," Kim Preston photographed everyday objects to looks like sea creatures.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UuOBDV&via=Digg&text=Everyday Objects Photographed To Look Like Sea Creatures

div.a: 268-Megapixel Camera Captures Its First Stunning Photo Of Space

div.div: Unlike other telescopes that can only capture small portions of the sky, the VST can photograph massively large regions due to its 268-megapixel CCD camera named OmegaCAM.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TNjpS6&via=Digg&text=268-Megapixel Camera Captures Its First Stunning Photo Of Space
